**Solution**:

Define the column vector of coefficients as $\vec{b} = (b_1, b_2)$. 
Let $\vec{y}$ be the column vector $(y_1, \dots, y_n)$ and let 
\[
\mat{X} = \begin{bmatrix}
x_1 & 1 \\
\vdots & \vdots \\
x_{n} & 1
\end{bmatrix}
\]
Finally, let $\vec{e}=(e_1,\dots,e_n)$ be a column vector of residuals.
The matrix form of the linear model is
\[
\vec{y} = \mat{X}\vec{b}+\vec{e}
\]
